definitions.definition: Of or relating to cosmopolites; cosmopolitan .
Oriented , exposed to or open to ideas and influences outside one's own social system or group.
Distributed throughout the world; having a wide geographical distribution .

main_definition: Of or relating to cosmopolites; cosmopolitan .
secondary_definitions: ( communication ) Oriented , exposed to or open to ideas and influences outside one's own social system or group.
( biology ) Distributed throughout the world; having a wide geographical distribution .
